projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: A functional chatbot interface using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The chatbot interacts with user, ask questions, display messages, and respond with precision.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts app
projects.description: A feel-good app that lets users post, like, and browse short messages â€“ all updated in real time. Built with React, Express, and MongoDB.

projects.name: Design handoff
projects.description: In this design handoff project, I implemented a responsive interface based on detailed Figma designs from the design team.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A responsive weather app that displays current conditions and a 4-day forecast based on real-time data from a selected city. Built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.name: Movie Site
projects.description: This app displays popular Christmas movies from TMDB by fetching data via its API. Built with React and React Router for navigation.

projects.name: Legacy Lock
projects.description: Legacy Lock is a team-developed virtual time capsule app that lets users store messages and media to be unlocked in the future, with secure authentication ensuring only authorized access.

projects.name: Album library
projects.description: This team-developed digital library uses diverse data collections and offers filtering, sorting, and random item selection. It features a responsive design that works across mobile, tablet, and desktop.

projects.name: Todo app
projects.description: The assignment was to build a Todo app using Zustand for state management. In this project, I aimed to explore Styled Components and refresh my newly acquired skills in using React Router.
